languages.text: {n}Синеватая струйка стекает по подбородку старика, и тот небрежно смазывает мутировавшую кровь рукавом. Только сейчас вы замечаете странные ожоги, покрывающие его плоть под одеяниями. Кажется, что даже малейшее движение доставляет ему невыносимую боль.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Синеватая струйка стекает по подбородку старика, и тот небрежно смазывает мутировавшую кровь рукавом. Только сейчас вы замечаете странные ожоги, покрывающие его плоть под одеяниями. Кажется, что даже малейшее движение доставляет ему невыносимую боль.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A bluish rivulet trickles down the old man's chin, and he wipes the mutated blood brusquely away with his sleeve. You glimpse strange burns covering his flesh under his clothing. Even the slightest movement must be causing him unbearable pain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Синеватая струйка стекает по подбородку старика, и тот небрежно смазывает мутировавшую кровь рукавом. Только сейчас вы замечаете странные ожоги, покрывающие его плоть под одеяниями. Кажется, что даже малейшее движение доставляет ему невыносимую боль.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A bluish rivulet trickles down the old man's chin, and he wipes the mutated blood brusquely away with his sleeve. You glimpse strange burns covering his flesh under his clothing. Even the slightest movement must be causing him unbearable pain.{/n}

{n}A bluish rivulet trickles down the old man's chin, and he wipes the mutated blood brusquely away with his sleeve. You glimpse strange burns covering his flesh under his clothing. Even the slightest movement must be causing him unbearable pain.{/n}

{n}A bluish rivulet trickles down the old man's chin, and he wipes the mutated blood brusquely away with his sleeve. You glimpse strange burns covering his flesh under his clothing. Even the slightest movement must be causing him unbearable pain.{/n}

{n}A bluish rivulet trickles down the old man's chin, and he wipes the mutated blood brusquely away with his sleeve. You glimpse strange burns covering his flesh under his clothing. Even the slightest movement must be causing him unbearable pain.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一条蓝色的血渍顺着老人的下巴流了下来，他用袖子粗暴地擦掉了变异的血液。你瞥见他的衣服下隐藏着古怪的烧伤痕迹，哪怕是最轻微的动作，恐怕都会给他带来难以忍受的痛苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bluish rivulet trickles down the old man's chin, and he wipes the mutated blood brusquely away with his sleeve. You glimpse strange burns covering his flesh under his clothing. Even the slightest movement must be causing him unbearable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一条蓝色的血渍顺着老人的下巴流了下来，他用袖子粗暴地擦掉了变异的血液。你瞥见他的衣服下隐藏着古怪的烧伤痕迹，哪怕是最轻微的动作，恐怕都会给他带来难以忍受的痛苦。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una gota azulada cae por la barbilla del anciano, que se limpia bruscamente la sangre mutante con la manga. Atisbas unas extrañas quemaduras bajo su ropa. Cada movimiento debe de causarle un dolor insufrible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bluish rivulet trickles down the old man's chin, and he wipes the mutated blood brusquely away with his sleeve. You glimpse strange burns covering his flesh under his clothing. Even the slightest movement must be causing him unbearable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una gota azulada cae por la barbilla del anciano, que se limpia bruscamente la sangre mutante con la manga. Atisbas unas extrañas quemaduras bajo su ropa. Cada movimiento debe de causarle un dolor insufrible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}青みがかった涙が老人の顎を伝った。老人は袖で無造作に変異した血を拭った。衣服の下に奇妙な火傷の跡が見える。それは、わずかな動きでも耐え難い痛みをもたらすのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bluish rivulet trickles down the old man's chin, and he wipes the mutated blood brusquely away with his sleeve. You glimpse strange burns covering his flesh under his clothing. Even the slightest movement must be causing him unbearable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}青みがかった涙が老人の顎を伝った。老人は袖で無造作に変異した血を拭った。衣服の下に奇妙な火傷の跡が見える。それは、わずかな動きでも耐え難い痛みをもたらすのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein bläuliches Rinnsal tropft dem alten Mann vom Kinn, und er wischt sich das mutierte Blut barsch mit dem Ärmel weg. Du siehst, dass das Fleisch unter seiner Kleidung voller Brandwunden ist. Schon die kleinste Bewegung muss ihm unerträgliche Schmerzen bereiten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bluish rivulet trickles down the old man's chin, and he wipes the mutated blood brusquely away with his sleeve. You glimpse strange burns covering his flesh under his clothing. Even the slightest movement must be causing him unbearable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein bläuliches Rinnsal tropft dem alten Mann vom Kinn, und er wischt sich das mutierte Blut barsch mit dem Ärmel weg. Du siehst, dass das Fleisch unter seiner Kleidung voller Brandwunden ist. Schon die kleinste Bewegung muss ihm unerträgliche Schmerzen bereiten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un filet bleuâtre coule le long du menton du vieil homme, qui essuie le sang muté avec sa manche. Sous ses vêtements, vous apercevez d'étranges brûlures qui recouvrent son corps. Le moindre mouvement doit lui infliger une douleur atroce.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bluish rivulet trickles down the old man's chin, and he wipes the mutated blood brusquely away with his sleeve. You glimpse strange burns covering his flesh under his clothing. Even the slightest movement must be causing him unbearable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un filet bleuâtre coule le long du menton du vieil homme, qui essuie le sang muté avec sa manche. Sous ses vêtements, vous apercevez d'étranges brûlures qui recouvrent son corps. Le moindre mouvement doit lui infliger une douleur atroce.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çenesinden aşağı mavimsi bir dere inen ihtiyar, mutasyonlu kanı giysisinin koluyla kabaca siliyor. Kıyafeti aralandığında teninde tuhaf yanıklar olduğunu görüyorsun. En küçük hareket bile adama dayanılmaz acılar veriyor olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bluish rivulet trickles down the old man's chin, and he wipes the mutated blood brusquely away with his sleeve. You glimpse strange burns covering his flesh under his clothing. Even the slightest movement must be causing him unbearable pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Çenesinden aşağı mavimsi bir dere inen ihtiyar, mutasyonlu kanı giysisinin koluyla kabaca siliyor. Kıyafeti aralandığında teninde tuhaf yanıklar olduğunu görüyorsun. En küçük hareket bile adama dayanılmaz acılar veriyor olmalı.{/n}
